title: Provisions of Regulations of Inclusive Housing, Amenity Space, if any, shall not be applicable for development under this Regulation
clause_text: Provisions of Regulations of Inclusive Housing, Amenity Space, if any, shall not be applicable for development under this Regulation. Moreover Regulation of required recreational open space shall not be applicable for development of reservation other than Residential purpose as mentioned at Sr.No.7.
section: General conditions / notes to allow development under above regulations :-

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
